name: Beef Simulator
description:
BEEF SIMULATOR is finally here!

Go on a journey across the vast farmlands in search of the 10 missing apples!

Meet so many animal friends on your journey as you seek to find all of the apples.

What's that? You're done with the main quest? (Doubt it.) But even if you are looking for something else to do, you have an entire farm at your disposal! Feel free to moo to your cow-heart's content. Eat some grass. Drink some water. The possibilities are endless!

So what are you waiting for?! Get out there and simulate some beef!

farm animals provided by Daniel Eddeland on OpenGameArt (https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-style-farm-animals)
